title: LOL launcher/client won't open
body:
My league launcher/client won't open, when i double click on the launcher.exe, the league logo comes up then disappears and nothing happens, I've tried deleting folders in the RADS folders, lol.launcher folders etc and it still won't work, when i go into processes from task manager the RADS_user_kernel appears for a blink second then closes by itself

Can I have a fix please

replies.body: If you've deleted the folders in RADS, then you may as well go for a full reinstall. Do that and tell us the results.
